    • Constructor Detail

      • HerdPropertiesDatabase

        public HerdPropertiesDatabase()

    • Method Detail

      • getHerdProperties

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> getHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID,
                                                                   int populationID,
                                                                   java.lang.String instructorID)
        Retrieve the list of herd's attributes selected by an user to be displayed for males and females. This list of attributes are called the display properties of an user. This list is the same for all herds owned by the same user in a specific population.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population.
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected population.
        instructorID - : Owner of the selected population (an instructor's username)
        Returns:
        The display properties of a selected user.

      • getFractionalDigits

        public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getFractionalDigits(java.lang.String userID,
                                                                                          int populationID,
                                                                                          java.lang.String instructorID)
        Get the list that set the number of significant decimal digits of an attribute. If attribute is not numeric, this number is not applied.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population.
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected population.
        instructorID - : Owner of the selected population (an instructor's username)
        Returns:
        The list of significant digits for each herd's attribute.

      • getMalesForBreeding

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.Long> getMalesForBreeding(java.lang.String userID,
                                                                   int populationID,
                                                                   java.lang.String instructorID)
        Get the list of males of a population that are available for breeding.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population.
        populationID - : Identifier of selected population.
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the selected population.
        Returns:
        List of identifiers of males

      • getSortAnimals

        public static int getSortAnimals(java.lang.String userID,
                                 int populationID,
                                 java.lang.String instructorID)
        Get the parameter that sets how to sort the animals to be displayed for an user.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population.
        populationID - : Identifier of the animals' population
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the animals' population
        Returns:
        A value HerdWebDisplay.AGE_INDEX if animals has to be sorted by age. Otherwise animals are sorted by their identifiers

      • getNumAnimalsToDisplay

        public static int getNumAnimalsToDisplay(java.lang.String userID,
                                         int populationID,
                                         java.lang.String instructorID)
        Get the number of animals to displayed by page for a target user.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population.
        populationID - : Identifier of the animals' population.
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the animals' population
        Returns:
        Amount of animals per page

      • existHerdProperties

        public static boolean existHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID,
                                          int populationID,
                                          java.lang.String instructorID)
        Check if user has defined display properties for the selected population. This set of properties is applied to all herds (owned by user) belonging to the same population. Thus, an user can only sets different display properties in different populations.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population
        populationID - : Identifier of the population.
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the population
        Returns:

      • saveHerdProperties

        public static void saveHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID,
                                      int populationID,
                                      java.lang.String instructorID,
                                      java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> chosenProperties,
                                      int animalsSort)
        Store the display properties of an user.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in a selected population
        populationID - : Identifier of a selected population
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the selected population
        chosenProperties - : List of males/females attributes that are chosen to be displayed
        animalsSort - : Parameter that sets how animals are sorted when they are displayed

      • deleteHerdProperties

        public static boolean deleteHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID)
        Delete all display properties of a chosen user. If user has herd in different populations, their display properties are also removed.
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of selected user (student, instructor)
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed. Otherwise false.

      • deleteHerdProperties

        public static boolean deleteHerdProperties(int populationID)
        Remove all display properties for all users of a target population.
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of the target population.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed. Otherwise false.

      • deleteHerdProperties

        public static boolean deleteHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID,
                                           int populationID)
        Remove the display properties of a selected user of a target population.
        Parameters:
        userID: - Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in target population
        populationID - : Identifier of the target population.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed. Otherwise false.

      • removeHerdProperties

                                           java.lang.String instructor)
        Remove all display properties of a target population
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of the target population.
        instructor - : Owner of the target population
        Returns:
        true if operation was successfully executed. Otherwise false.

                                        java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> chosenProperties)

        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of an student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population
        populationID - : Identifier of the target population
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the target population
        chosenProperties - : List of males/females attributes selected to be displayed

        Parameters:

        populationID - : Identifier of the target population
        instructorID - : Username of the owner of the target population
        males - : List of male IDs

      • updateHerdProperties

        public static void updateHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID,
                                        int populationID,
                                        java.lang.String instructorID,
                                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> list)
        Update significant digits for a set of herd's attributes
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population
        populationID - : Identifier of selected population.
        instructorID - : Owner (Username) of the selected population.
        list - : Mapping list of herd's attributes and number of significant digits

      • updateHerdProperties

        public static void updateHerdProperties(java.lang.String userID,
                                        int populationID,
                                        java.lang.String instructorID,
                                        int animalsSort)
        Update the sort parameter for a selected population and user
        Parameters:
        userID - : Username of student or instructor that owns at least one herd in selected population
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected population
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the selected population
        animalsSort - : New Sort parameter (By age or by AnimalID). See HerdWebDisplay.AGE_INDEX

      • updateNumAnimalsToDisplay

                                             java.lang.String instructorID,

        Update the number of animals to be displayed per page
        Parameters:

        populationID - : Identifier of the selected population
        instructorID - : Owner (username) of the selected population
